verse:
इष्टापूर्तं मन्यमाना वरिष्ठं नान्यच्छ्रेयो वेदयन्ते प्रमूढाः।
नाकस्य पृष्ठे ते सुकृतेऽनुभूत्वेमं लोकं हीनतरं वा विशन्ति ॥
meaning: Meaning:Ignorant or foolish people believe that by fulfilling their desires, they have achieved the best and there is nothing better than that. They consider themselves to be the highest. However, they do not comprehend that their understanding is limited. Such people, after experiencing the results of their virtuous actions in this world, either enter a lower world or continue to remain in this world.
